content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Removing a Microsoft Identity Protection account The steps outlined below detail how to remove the Microsoft Identity Protection account to revoke access to Microsoft Identity Protection. Procedure Choose Administration → Service Account. Select the Microsoft Identity Protection account and click Remove. On the Remove Microsoft Identity Protection screen that appears, click OK. The account disappears from the Service Account screen. © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base

metadata.title: Removing a Microsoft Identity Protection account
